title: Linear Scaler for Input Variable
name: LGF_ScaleLinear
description: This function scales an input variable (LReal) via a linear straight-line equation.

input.name: x1
input.description: Point 1 (P1) -`x` coordinate of the linear function

input.name: y1
input.description: Point 1 (P1) -`y` coordinate of the linear function

input.name: x2
input.description: Point 2 (P2) -`x` coordinate of the linear function

input.name: y2
input.description: Point 2 (P2) -`y` coordinate of the linear function

input.name: yMin
input.description: Lower limit value of the output

input.name: yMax
input.description: High limit value of the output
